thread.section_title: Servicecaster Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Servicecaster | servicecaster.com
thread.title: George Fooshee

author: George Fooshee
title: George Fooshee
text:
Found you on internet. Talked to a person and was able to order just what we wanted. Product included $8.00 postage and handliing. Came in 2 days. However, It met our specs, but we were using them on carpet with a heavy chair and it just did not roll because the carpeet had padding and it would not roll. As an 87 year old man, I had to work out another way.
I returned them today via UPS. Any refund woujd be appreciated >
